titleStmt.title: The nature of that salvation, which the Gospel offereth, and the method of obtaining it, by a mediator a sermon preach'd in the Cathedral Church of St. Paul, March the 6th, 1698/9, being the third, for this year, of the lecture founded by the Honourable Robert Boyle, Esq. / by Samuel Bradford ...
titleStmt.author: Bradford, Samuel, 1652-1731.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
